title: MOONFALL
description: MOONFALL captures the mesmerizing moment of a planet's implosion through the intricate use of Blender's shader nodes. This artwork brings to life the dramatic collapse of a celestial body, where the delicate balance of forces spirals into a cataclysmic event. The implosion is depicted with stunning realism, showcasing the dynamic interplay of light and shadow, and the intricate details of the planet's surface as it succumbs to its fate.  Crafted with precision and artistic flair, MOONFALL immerses viewers in a cosmic spectacle, blending scientific accuracy with creative imagination. Each frame of the animation reveals the relentless power of the implosion, drawing the audience into the heart of this astronomical phenomenon. The use of advanced shader techniques adds depth and texture, making the implosion appear both chaotic and beautiful.  Explore the beauty of destruction and the artistry of cosmic events with MOONFALL, an animation that pushes the boundaries of 3D rendering and visual storytelling.

title: NOVASTRA #2
description: HAIRS : Its the continuation of my realistic humans creation. In previous post i have completed modeling and texturing the character, In this render i have added the hair particle system as well as the hair cards for optimised render time. The most difficult part for this was adding the vellus hairs and making them look correct.

title: NOVASTRA
description: “NOVASTRA” is basically my fantasy character world where I create what I imagine.

title: OUR PLANET
description: “Our Planet” is a digital rendition of our beloved planet. Created using Blender, it underwent further refinement in After Effects and Photoshop to enhance its visual appeal. To capture the essence of Earth, I sourced textures from NASA’s vast collection, ensuring accuracy and detail. Through this piece, viewers can explore the beauty and complexity of our planet in a captivating digital format.

title: Mechanical Harmony
description:
For my work sample submitted to skillCat, I meticulously modeled a screw and screwdriver, paying close attention to detail. One notable aspect is the use of layer blending for the intricate texturing of the screwdriver handle. By carefully layering different textures and adjusting their blending modes, I achieved a realistic and tactile appearance, enhancing the overall quality of the model.
Furthermore, I employed photorealistic lighting techniques and physics simulations to ensure accurate placement of objects within the scene. This added a sense of realism by mimicking how light interacts with the surfaces of the screw and screwdriver, as well as how they would naturally behave when manipulated. The combination of these techniques resulted in a visually striking and technically impressive representation of the screw and screwdriver, showcasing my skills as a 3D artist.

title: DRIFT
description: I used Blender’s magic to sculpt, texture, and animate a car in 3D. With Blender,I set the scene with dynamic lighting, all within Blender’s friendly interface. Experience the thrill as the car cruises through its digital world, a testament to Blender’s power in my hands.

title: Enlightenment
description: Within the immersive realm crafted in Blender, Buddha emerges, a digital manifestation, serenely poised amidst the meticulously sculpted garden, transcending pixels to embody peace and enlightenment.

title: Etherial
description: In Blender’s world, a golden mask materializes, seamlessly changing alongside evolving shapes, forming a captivating digital display.

title: cloak
description: In the obscure depths of imagination, the ‘Cloak’ emerges as a profound testament to the human psyche. Within the shadowy confines of Blender’s digital canvas, a haunting paradox unfolds: a veiled human visage, both obscured and revealed. The very essence of our identity, hidden beneath layers of metaphorical cloth, speaks of the enigma that shrouds our existence. This evocative creation weaves a narrative of concealed vulnerability and the mystique of the unknown, casting an eerie aura that beckons us to contemplate the concealed intricacies of the human soul.

title: Abstract Geometry Nodes
description:
Step into a world of creativity and innovation as we showcase a mesmerizing blend of Blender art featuring abstract geometry nodes and dynamic motion graphics, all brought to life through the enchanting touch of Cycles rendering. Experience the synergy of abstract forms and captivating motion, meticulously crafted to evoke a sense of wonder and awe. Witness the fusion of artistic expression and cutting-edge technology in this showcase of visual artistry. Join us on a visual journey that transcends boundaries and redefines artistic possibility.


Embark on a journey through the boundless realms of imagination with my collection of 3D abstract concept art. Each piece is a symphony of form, color, and perspective, inviting viewers to explore a world where reality intertwines with the surreal. With meticulous attention to detail and a mastery of Blender and After Effects, I craft these digital landscapes to challenge perceptions and evoke emotion. Discover a fusion of geometry, light, and abstraction that pushes the boundaries of visual storytelling.
